variants.Description in input context: This variant is located at position 268 of PTEN gene and results in an amino acid change Q93K in the protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HeLa cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of the variant NM_000314.5:c.268G>A was significantly reduced compared to the wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's multiple comparison test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than or equal to 80% compared to the wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 80% compared to the wild-type.
